snippet.title: Vivaland: Dream House - Co-op Building With Friends
snippet.description:
*🔴 Releasing on the 1st of March and will be free to play!🏡*

Dream House is the prologue of Vivaland, a co-op life simulation game. 
*Wishlist the full Vivaland game here:*
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1976830/Vivaland/

Are you dreaming of a nice cottage house, or you’re more into modern architecture? In Vivaland, you can have both! 😉 Play with the colors of 830+ furniture items, and experiment with curved walls and resizable decorations! Furnish with your favorite style, use our unique building tools, and team up with friends to create the ultimate dream house! 🏡

*🌟 Wishlist Dream House on Steam to get free access upon release🌟*
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2606170/Vivaland_Dream_House/

Find out more about our game here:

🟣 Discord community: log in for the insider info & chat with us here!
https://discord.com/invite/zJ46rdctNn

🟠 Support the development on Patreon!
https://www.patreon.com/vivaland

🔵 Follow us on Twitter for the latest updates!
https://twitter.com/vivalandgame

🔴 Tiktok for creative content:
https://www.tiktok.com/@vivalandgame

⚫Check out our website!
https://vivalandgame.com/
